name: io.bytes.per.checksum
explanation: The configuration for the number of bytes per checksum is missing. This could cause issues with data integrity checks during task execution.

name: yarn.sharedcache.cleaner.resource-sleep-ms
explanation: The value for the yarn.sharedcache.cleaner.resource-sleep-ms is set to 0. This could cause the cleaner to continuously run without any sleep, potentially causing resource exhaustion.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
explanation: The dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels is set to 0. This means a linear list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs, which could potentially cause performance issues.
